## About

This is a self-designed deep learning framework created by victor @Hangzhou


## Features
+ Define Dynamic Computing Graph
+ Define Neural Network Operator
+ define Linear, Sigmoid, L2_loss
+ Auto_Diff Computing
+ Auto-Feedforward and Backward

## Remain
+ Classificaiton
+ Cross-Entropy
+ CNN, RNN
